```{r setup, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
londonIcon <- makeIcon(
     iconUrl = "https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/6502/6502331.png",
     iconWidth = 70*215/230, iconHeight = 70,
     iconAnchorX = 70*215/230, iconAnchorY = 70
)

flaticonSite <- "<a href='https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/london' title='london icons'>London icons created by Freepik - Flaticon</a>"

bigBen <- data.frame(lat = 51.510357,
                 lng = -0.116773)

bigBen %>%
     leaflet() %>%
     addTiles() %>%
     addMarkers(icon = londonIcon,
                popup = flaticonSite)
```
